sqlMap.insert: UPDATE PLACE SET AUTHCODE = #newAuthCode# WHERE FID = #fid#
sqlMap.select: SELECT FID, AUTHCODE FROM PLACE WHERE FID = #fid#

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.ISAUTH, A.FID, A.FNAME, A.LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.NLDNO, A.MOBILE, A.PHONE1, A.IMAGEHOST, A.FILENAME, A.CATEGORY, A.SERVICETYPE, A.REMARK, A.EMAIL, A.CLOSEDDAY, A.OPENDAY, A.WEBSITE, A.INFO, A.QRCODE, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, S.BASNAME AS SERVICETYPE, P.BASNAME AS PLACETYPE, A.FULLADDRESS, A.SIDO, A.GUGUN, A.DONG, A.NEWADDRESS, A.PAYINFO, A.PARKINFO, A.BLDINFO FROM PLACE A LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD S ON A.SERVICETYPE = PB.BASECD AND PB.GRPCD = 'SERVICETYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD P ON A.PLACETYPE = PB.BASECD AND PB.GRPCD = 'PLACETYPE' WHERE A.FID= #fid#
